662150.name: Tower!2011:SE - Key West [KEYW] Airport
662150.description:
Key West International Airport [KEYW] for TOWER!2011:SE


Key West aviation history begins with a 1913 flight to Cuba by Augustin Parla. Key West`s airport opened with one terminal in 1957.
In February of 2009 a new 30000 square foot terminal opened, doubling the size of the airport.
Key West International Airport covers 255 acres and has one asphalt runway(9/27).
In 2006 the airport had 94,408 aircraft operations, average 258/day.
662150.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
